welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Sikeston, located in the heart of the United States. Known for its friendly locals and delicious BBQ, we invite you to explore our beautiful city and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cape Girardeau Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Cape Girardeau Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Cairo Airport, where most international and domestic flights operate.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Terminal 1 is used for domestic flights within the United States.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is used for international flights to and from other countries.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but it may be limited in some areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Malden Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Malden Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
